items.question: What’s the best thing about JSNXT?
items.answer: It’s flexible, fast, and scalable. JSNXT combines the power of Next.js and Express.js into one full-stack solution.

items.question: Is this suitable for production?
items.answer: Absolutely. With API routes handled via Express and frontend via Next.js, you get SSR and backend logic in one place.

features.subtitle: Deploy faster with JSNXT
features.title: Features to boost your Next.js apps

items.name: Instant deployment.
items.description: Deploy your Next.js apps quickly with automated workflows, ensuring a smooth deployment process.

items.name: Efficient state management.
items.description: Integrate state management with tools like Redux for scalable and maintainable apps.

items.name: Authentication services.
items.description: Ensure your application’s security with authentication services and fingerprint authentication.

items.name: Customizable API.
items.description: Build powerful and flexible APIs using Express.js to handle backend logic and data flow for your Next.js applications.

items.name: Performance optimization.
items.description: Boost your app's performance with built-in features like server-side rendering and static site generation.

items.name: Customizable routing.
items.description: Take control of routing in your Next.js application with dynamic routes and an intuitive URL structure.

errors.noUser: No user is currently logged in.

announcement.text: New: Now with MongoDB + Auth integration.

hero.title: Kickstart your next project with JSNXT
hero.subtitle: A modern and scalable boilerplate using Next.js, Express.js, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS — built for developers who value structure and speed.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.heading: Choose the right plan for your JSNXT project
pricing.subheading: Flexible plans to suit your needs, whether you're just starting or scaling up.

tiers.name: Starter
tiers.description: Perfect for personal projects or small apps, with access to essential features.

tiers.name: Business
tiers.description: Ideal for growing teams and businesses that need advanced features and priority support.

tiers.name: Enterprise
tiers.description: The most powerful plan with dedicated infrastructure, custom integrations, and personal support.

testimonial.text: JSNXT has been a game-changer for my development workflow. As someone who constantly spins up new projects, having a well-structured Next.js/Express.js boilerplate with integrated authentication, API handlers, and a clean component architecture has saved me countless hours. It's the perfect foundation for both rapid prototyping and production-grade applications.
testimonial.author: Shadow Of Leaf
testimonial.title: Creator of JSNXT

policy_content.intro: This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, and disclose your personal information when you use our services.
policy_content.collection: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as when you create an account, and information automatically collected when you use our services.
policy_content.use: We use your information to provide, maintain, and improve our services, communicate with you, and for other purposes described in this policy.
policy_content.sharing: We may share your information with third parties as described in this policy, including service providers and as required by law.
policy_content.choices: You have choices regarding your information, including accessing, correcting, or deleting your personal information.
policy_content.more: For more details, please refer to our full privacy policy.
